summary: This is a supplemental ex parte declaration by an FBI Special Agent in support of the government's response to a motion to quash grand jury subpoenas in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The agent details new information from an interview with a 14-year-old victim (Jane Doe) who was recruited to provide massages and engage in sexual acts with Epstein, and describes evidence of nude photography of the minor, arguing the subpoenaed computers likely contain evidence of solicitation of minors and child pornography.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI investigation for solicitation of minors to engage in prostitution and lewd and lascivious conduct with minors. Described as engaging in sexual acts with and in front of minors at his Palm Beach home.

persons.name: Jane Doe
persons.context: A 14-year-old girl recruited to provide massages to Jeffrey Epstein. She reported approximately 100 visits to his home where sexual acts occurred, and was paid for massages and for posing for nude photographs.

connections.description: M recruited the 14-year-old Jane Doe to provide massages to Jeffrey Epstein.
M had contact with Epstein starting at age 15 to provide personal massages, and later recruited another minor for him.
Epstein engaged in sexual acts with and in front of Jane Doe during massages, paid her, and had nude photographs taken of her.

events.title: Filing of Supplemental Declaration
events.description: An FBI Special Agent files a supplemental ex parte declaration detailing new victim testimony to support the government's response to a motion to quash grand jury subpoenas.

events.title: Recruitment and First Visit of Jane Doe
events.description: M, age 17, recruits 14-year-old Jane Doe and brings her to Epstein's Palm Beach home. Epstein engages in sexual intercourse in front of Jane Doe during this first visit.

events.title: Series of Massage Visits
events.description: Jane Doe estimates returning to Epstein's home approximately 100 times. Epstein masturbated in her presence during nearly all massages and progressively tried to engage her in more sexual behavior.

events.title: Group Sexual Encounter
events.description: Epstein introduced an unidentified female who performed oral sex on Jane Doe while Epstein had sexual intercourse with that female.

events.title: Nude Photography Session
events.description: When Jane Doe was approximately 16, Epstein's assistant called her to arrange a photography session. Epstein took a series of nude photographs of her at various locations on his property using a digital camera. She was paid $500.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida
keyFacts: A new victim, Jane Doe, was 14 years old when first recruited by another female minor, M, to provide massages to Jeffrey Epstein.
Jane Doe estimated she visited Epstein's Palm Beach home approximately 100 times, during which Epstein masturbated in her presence during all but three massages and escalated sexual demands.
Epstein arranged and took a series of nude photographs of Jane Doe when she was approximately 16 years old, using a digital camera on his property.
The FBI agent asserts that computers subject to the grand jury subpoena are likely to contain evidence of Epstein's solicitation of minors and may contain child pornography.
The declaration supports the government's argument against quashing subpoenas by providing specific, new evidence of criminal activity involving a minor.
